text: So I started brewing this up yesterday. I'm open to all suggestions and feedback.
I’m glad I’m not the only one who jams blighted woodland in any deck I can
I should run it more. There’s no downside
Or not much anyway
It's amazing with something like Crucible or Excavator. Hell it's good on its own.
I love the wedge but I've never been much of a jund player. It's definitely a weak point for me.
I’ve found three colors is just too many choices for me and I struggle being happy with any iteration of any three color deck because there’s too many cards I want to play
[[wayward swordtooth]] might slot in here
